titles.title: Northeast Corridor Rail Tunnel Safety Act
To provide for certain tunnel life safety and rehabilitation projects for Amtrak.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Railroads, Pipelines, and Hazardous Materials.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/12/2013--Introduced. Northeast Corridor Rail Tunnel Safety Act - Authorizes appropriations to the Secretary of Transportation (DOT) for Amtrak use, after the Secretary has received and approved a project engineering and financial plan, to complete New York tunnel life safety projects and to rehabilitate tunnels in Washington, DC, and Baltimore, Maryland.
